main.name: VISHAL KUMAR SAW
main.bio: I am a Computer Science and Engineering Student at Indian Institute of Technology (BHU), Varanasi. I am interested in competitive programming, software development and problem solving. My hobbies include playing cricket and badminton.
main.contactmessage: If you are looking for someone who is open to new opportunities and excited to learn, please email me at vishalkrsaw19035059@gmail.com

education.description: Qualified the most competitive engineering entrance exam in India and got admitted to one of the prestigious institutes in the country. Currently I am pursuing my B.Tech degree in Computer Science and Engineering from here.

work.title: Web Designer and Developer
work.description: Worked as a web developer and designer for the sparks foundation. Made a banking website using MERN Stack, where transactions records for the people were to be stored.
